00052 void RandomUniform :: setParameter(const ParameterName p, 
00053                                   boost::shared_ptr<Generator> g, 
00054                                   ParameterContext pc)
00055 {
00056     switch (p) {                       
00057         case parameterNameMinimum:       
00058             parameterMinimum = g;    
00059             break;              
00060         case parameterNameMaximum:                         
00061             parameterMaximum = g;                  
00062             break;              
00063 
00064     } // end case            
00065 }

00071 // =============================================================================
00072 // get a value for a time/sample point
00073 double RandomUniform :: getValueAtSecond(double secondTime)
00074 {
00075     return denorm(randUnit(), 
00076                   parameterMinimum->getValueAtSecond(secondTime),
00077                   parameterMaximum->getValueAtSecond(secondTime)
00078             );
00079 }

00081 // =============================================================================
00082 // get a value for a time/sample point
00083 double RandomUniform :: getValueAtSample(long sampleTime)
00084 {
00085     return denorm(randUnit(), 
00086                   parameterMinimum->getValueAtSample(sampleTime),
00087                   parameterMaximum->getValueAtSample(sampleTime)
00088             );
00089 }
